author: Ryan Daws
description:
AMD and Sony have detailed three co-engineered foundational technologies destined for next-gen gaming hardware, including the PS6. In a joint presentation, AMD’s Jack Huynh was joined by PlayStation architect Mark Cerny to detail the innovations set to enhance real-time graphics through advancements in machine learning, ray tracing, and data compression. The collaboration between the industry […]

The post Sony and AMD co-engineer next-gen gaming tech destined for PS6 appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Sony and AMD co-engineer next-gen gaming tech destined for PS6
